I think this is the ultimate philosophical question 👇.  If the XEM::CAT relationship is viewed as an upgrade (like NXT::ARDR), then opt-out seems like a good fit.  If the XEM::CAT relationship is viewed as a new chain (like XRP::XLM), then opt-in seems more natural.
